com.dp16.dynamicrunninginghent

Class RunningMapLocationSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dp16.dynamicrunninginghent.RunningMapLocationSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, com.google.android.gms.maps.LocationSource

    public class RunningMapLocationSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.google.android.gms.maps.LocationSource, EventListener
    Custom location source for the Google Maps Normally they start their own location provider but this is not wanted for two reasons: 1. We already implemented a location provider so we don't want google to start a second ne 2. This way we can use our custom location provider mock while the normal 'blue dot' is still used This class does not do much except for listening for RawLocations and passing them to the OnLocationChangedListener Created by hendrikdepauw on 22/03/2017.

    Messages Produced: None.

    Messages Consumed: Constants.EventTypes.RAW_LOCATION
